name: Ocean Protector (itch)
description:
A FEW DAYS AGO A SMALL ASTEROID FELL INTO THE OCEAN. STRANGE ALIEN FISH ARE DECIMATING THE LOCAL FAUNA.

YOU HAVE BEEN HIRED TO PROTECT THE ENVIRONMENT AND RELOCATE THE ALIEN FISH TO A SECURED LOCATION.

>>>HOW TO PLAY<<<
PRESS AND HOLD SPACEBAR TO LOCATE THE ASTEROID...

RELEASE SPACEBAR TO START

MOVE WITH ARROW KEYS
